tag_list: buck-reed, sheri-sharman, mvp, monavie, network-marketing, success-coaching
overview:
Buck Reed is an entrepreneur who has acquired millions of dollars from the network marketing industry. He has decades of experience and now owns MVP (Most Valuable Person) with Sheri Sharman.

Through MVP, Buck Reed travels around the world teaching training sessions in which he teaches entrepreneurs how to achieve financial and emotional success in life.

Buck Reed aims to help people become more than they thought was possible and to help each individual grow into a richer person. He feels extremely fortunate to have shared impacting moments with so many talented people!
